titles: A modest advertisement concerning the present controversie about church-government wherein the maine grounds of that booke, intituled The unlawfulnesse and danger of limited prelacie, are calmly examined.
author: Morley, George, 1597-1684.
notes: Attributed to George Morley.  Cf. BLC.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
keywords: Baillie, Robert, 1599-1662. --  Unlawfulnesse and danger of limited episcopacie.
